766500.name: The Hordes of the Dead
766500.description:
The Hordes of the Dead is a third-person survival horror game where you’ll explore devastated areas, search for a safe place, and face relentless hordes of zombies.

Manage your stamina, find resources, and survive slow but deadly zombies. They won’t stop until they tear you apart.

● Tense and visceral third-person combat
● Cinematic bite and death animations
● A dark atmosphere designed for maximum tension
● Mission and exploration system to progress through different areas
● Detailed gore and brutal encounters

The apocalypse has no explanation. No one is coming to save you.

Can you find a safe place... or will you become part of the Horde?
766500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
